QuestData.Title: A Minor Substitution
QuestData.Description: Krenna, she be wantin' worg hides for all the outfits. There's not gonna be enough worg hides for her army, though. Not now, not ever.$B$BThose worgs -- they be skinny, mon! Here's what we're gonna do... if you can keep a secret that is.$B$BEast of Voldrune there be grizzly bears as fat as an ogre. Those large hides -- those we can use!$B$BHurry, $g brother:sister;. Krenna's not known for her patience.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hidetrader Jun'ik wants you to bring him 6 Grizzly Hides.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm in your debt, mon. Take this as payment.
